Donna has done an outstanding job taking care of me and my family throughout this process. We’ve been researching pools for over five years, and ultimately chose a Thursday Pool because of its exceptional longevity warranty and the high-quality resin gel coat. We couldn’t be happier with our purchase and the experience!
